refnamediv.refpurpose: Read sampled sound from a table with high precision and cubic interpolation.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Read sampled sound (mono or stereo) from a table, with looping, and high precision. lposcil3 uses cubic interpolation.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares lposcil3 kamp, kfreqratio, kloop, kend, ifn [, iphs]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreqratio -- multiply factor of table frequency (for example: 1 = original frequency, 1.5 = a fifth up , .5 = an octave down)

lposcil3 (looping precise oscillator) allows varying at k-rate, the starting and ending point of a sample contained in a table (GEN01). This can be useful when reading a sampled loop of a wavetable, where repeat speed can be varied during the performance.
